dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: SIN IS DEFORMITY AND SALVATION IS RESTORATION

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: washed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb

cognitieve_implicaties: The hearer views their moral failures as external stains that can be removed.
theologische_implicaties: Atonement is an objective act applied to the believer.
ethische_implicaties: The believer is called to maintain a state of 'purity' or 'readiness'.
onbedoelde_consequenties: The paradox of 'washing in blood' to become 'white' can feel grotesque or nonsensical to modern ears if not revitalized.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: This is a standard liturgical image from Revelation, often used without re-engaging the physical shock of blood as a cleaning agent.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher uses a dialectical structure, pitting the 'Dust/Nothingness' metaphors of Ecclesiastes against the 'City/Light' metaphors of Revelation. The coherence is maintained by the 'Power of God' acting as the bridge between these two states.

incoherentie_punten.metafoor_a: LIFE IS A TALE TOLD BY AN IDIOT (Macbeth)
incoherentie_punten.metafoor_b: THE KING OF GLORY PASSES ON HIS WAY
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The preacher leaves the tension between 'meaningless theater' and 'royal procession' unresolved to emphasize the 'tension of faith'.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: If life is an idiot's tale, there is no King; if there is a King, the tale is not told by an idiot.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The preacher uses the 'Promise' as a cognitive anchor that allows the hearer to hold both the reality of decay and the hope of renewal simultaneously.

sterktes.beschrijving: The preacher revitalizes the 'Dust' metaphor by connecting it to the concrete experience of a local cemetery and forgotten family mementos.
sterktes.voorbeeld: I have walked in it many times... they will neither know nor care who I was.

risicos.beschrijving: The preacher explicitly warns against literalizing Revelation (not a Rand-McNally map), which mitigates the risk of fundamentalist misinterpretation.
risicos.voorbeeld: It is not a timetable for the end of the world.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Encourages a more sophisticated, symbolic understanding of scripture.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The 'Dusty' world of Ecclesiastes and the Essex cemetery—a world of decay and fading memory.
sub_worlds: The 'Celestial' world of Revelation (thrones, white robes, no tears).
The 'Domestic' world of family photographs and illness (brain tumor).

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; creates a 'goose bump' effect through contrast.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By emphasizing that the validity of the metaphors depends on the 'source' (God) rather than human wishing.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Using the 'harsh' canonical text of Ecclesiastes to overwrite the 'wishful' Apocryphal text.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: Faith as a tension-filled trust in the midst of real suffering.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with the All Saints feast day but subverts the typical 'praise of famous men' with a focus on the 'obscure' and 'forgotten'.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the contrast between the 'Dust/Void' domain and the 'Kingdom/City' domain. It avoids the Economic domain (transactional grace) in favor of the Relational and Architectural domains. The preacher successfully moves from 'Dead Metaphors' (dust) to 'Living Realities' by grounding them in personal grief.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'washing' to the 'tears' mentioned later—the salt/water of grief being transformed.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The blood isn't just a ritual liquid; it's the cost of the love that wipes the tears.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The conflict between Macbeth's 'Idiot's Tale' and the 'King's Procession'.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Suggest that the 'King' enters the 'Idiot's Tale' to rewrite the script from within.

entailment_checks.metafoor: God will wipe away every tear
entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests a passive role for humans in their own healing.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the 'work' mentioned in the introduction to ensure ethical agency.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To bridge 'Dust' and 'New Life', the metaphor of a seed dying in the earth (John 12:24) would provide a biological link between the two main worlds.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to navigate the 'lowdown' of the human condition while maintaining the 'resplendent' hope of the Gospel.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the use of Macbeth, CMT reveals that Macbeth is used as a 'Source Domain' to structure the hearer's fear of nihilism.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's experiential learning cycles, CMT shows how the preacher uses 'Verticality' (God coming down) to disrupt the hearer's horizontal experience of time/decay.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the 'Apocrypha vs. Canon' argument is actually a clash between two different conceptual mappings of 'Memory': MEMORY AS PERMANENT RECORD vs. MEMORY AS FRAGILE DUST.

appendices.notities: The preacher effectively uses 'Deictic Shifts' to move the congregation from the 'here and now' of Essex to the 'eternal then' of the New Jerusalem.
